definition: (old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
TOEFL/Test of English as a Foreign Language
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Tell us your early experience of training TOFEL test.
sentences.chinese: 能說說看您早期的一些從事托福考試培訓的經歷嗎？

sentences.english: I got a high score on TOEFL.
I am preparing for the TOFEL test.
sentences.chinese: 我在準備參加托福考試。

sentences.english: She was going to reenter for TOEFL.
sentences.chinese: 她將重新報名參加托福考試。

sentences.english: He wanted to study abroad, but he failed to pass the TOFEL test.
sentences.chinese: 他想出國唸書，但他沒通過托福考試。

sentences.english: As from today, NEEA starts to accept online registration.
sentences.chinese: 自即日起，考試中心開始接受新托福考試網上報名。

sentences.english: Have you decided on when to take the TOEFL examination.
sentences.chinese: 你決定什麼時候考托福考試了嗎？

sentences.english: A: Did you hear that Stone got caught cheating on his TOEFL exam?
sentences.chinese: 你聽說石頭在托福考試中作弊被抓的事了嗎？
他的托福考試勉強通過了。

sentences.english: Strange as it was, he passed TOFEL.
sentences.chinese: 雖然似乎很奇怪，但他通過了托福考試。

sentences.english: A： She is really something to have passed the TOEFL exam in her freshman year.
sentences.chinese: 他大一時就通過了托福考試，太了不起了。

sentences.english: What do you say to the first new TOFEL test?
sentences.chinese: 您如何評價新托福考在中國的第一次考試？

sentences.english: You've been training TOFEL test for over 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 您培訓托福考試已經超過15年了。

definition: TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication)
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
